bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz near your head. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I make a 'zzzzz' sound.
🌷 I like to visit flowers.
🍯 I make honey!

bug.question: I am small and red with black spots. I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have dots on my back.
🐞 My name includes 'lady'.
🌱 I like to eat aphids from plants

bug.question: I hop around in the grass. I have strong legs and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am green and long.
🎶 I make music with my legs.
🦘 I jump very far.

bug.question: I march in a line and carry food. I am very strong for my size. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I work with my friends.
🐜 I live in a colony underground.
🍚 I can carry things much heavier than me.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then make a chrysalis. Later, I fly with colorful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have pretty wings.
🐛 I eat leaves when I'm young.
🦋 I go through a big change!

bug.question: I live in the ground and come out when it rains. Birds love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I like wet weather.
🪱 I am long and wiggly.
🐦 Birds like to eat me!

bug.question: I like to hide under rocks and logs. I have many legs. Don't touch me, I can bite!

hints.text: 🪵 I am often found under rotting wood.
💯 I have many, many legs.
😬 Be careful, I can give you a nip!

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs, not six. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I trap my meals with a special design.
🕷️ Some people are afraid of me.
👀 I have more legs than an insect.

bug.question: I come out at night and like to fly around lights. Some people think I am a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I like the darkness.
💡 I am attracted to bright lights.
🦋 I am related to a butterfly.

bug.question: I live in water when I am young and can fly when I grow up. I have big eyes and long wings. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I start my life in a pond or lake.
✨ I have large, beautiful eyes.
🌿 I eat other bugs.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I'm bigger than a swimming pool!
🌊 You can sail a boat on me.
🐠 Many animals live here.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat plants and leaves.
🐌 I am a type of mollusk.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 My arms can grab things really well!
⚫ I can change color to hide.
🦑 I squirt ink when I'm scared.

ocean.question: I am a big animal that lives in the ocean and spouts water from my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal, not a fish.
🎶 I make a loud singing sound.
🚢 People like to watch me on boats.

ocean.question: I am colorful and live in a shell, and can be found on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 You can hear the ocean when you hold me to your ear!
🏖️ I'm usually empty when you find me.
🌊 I used to be somebody's home.

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and love to play in the waves. I'm very smart, what am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I like to jump out of the water.
🐟 I eat fish.
🌊 People swim with me.

ocean.question: I am a fish with sharp teeth and like to hunt in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 People are sometimes scared of me!
🌊 I have a fin on my back.
🦷 My teeth help me eat.

ocean.question: I'm a creature that looks like a star and lives on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have arms, but I don't hug!
🖐️ Some people call me a sea star.
🏜️ I live near coral reefs.

ocean.question: I am green, have a shell, and swim slowly in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay eggs on the beach.
🥬 I like to eat seaweed.
⛱️ I am a reptile

ocean.question: I am a very small, colorful fish who lives in an anemone. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I have orange and white stripes.
🤡 People sometimes call me by another name...
🏠 The anemone protects me from predators.
